EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

AccountsAndOtherReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Accounts and Other Receivables, Net, Current
AccountsAndOtherReceivablesNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance, receivable from customers, clients, or other third-parties, and receivables classified as other due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AccountsPayableCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Current
AccountsPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccruedIncomeTaxesCurrent.label: Accrued Income Taxes, Current
AccruedIncomeTaxesCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all currently due domestic and foreign income tax obligations.

AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.label: Accumulated Amortization, Debt Issuance Costs
AccumulatedAmortizationDeferredFinanceCo.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of debt issuance costs.

AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant, and Equipment
AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization for physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as current.

AmortizationOfDebtDiscountPremium.label: Amortization of Debt Discount (Premium)
AmortizationOfDebtDiscountPremium.description: Amount of noncash expense included in interest expense to amortize debt discount and premium associated with the related debt instruments. Excludes amortization of financing costs. Alternate captions include noncash interest expense.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

AssetRetirementObligation.label: Asset Retirement Obligation
AssetRetirementObligation.description: The carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

AssetRetirementObligationAccretionExpens.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Accretion Expense
AssetRetirementObligationAccretionExpens.description: Amount of accretion expense recognized during the period that is associated with an asset retirement obligation. Accretion expense measures and incorporates changes due to the passage of time into the carrying amount of the liability.

AssetRetirementObligationCurrent.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Current
AssetRetirementObligationCurrent.description: Current portion of the carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesIncu.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Liabilities Incurred
AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesIncu.description: Amount of asset retirement obligations incurred during the period.

AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesSett.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Liabilities Settled
AssetRetirementObligationLiabilitiesSett.description: Amount of asset retirement obligations settled, or otherwise disposed of, during the period. This may include asset retirement obligations transferred to third parties associated with the sale of a long-lived asset.

AssetRetirementObligationRevisionOfEstim.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Revision of Estimate
AssetRetirementObligationRevisionOfEstim.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the asset retirement obligation from changes in the amount or timing of the estimated cash flows associated with the settlement of the obligation.

AssetRetirementObligationsNoncurrent.label: Asset Retirement Obligations, Noncurrent
AssetRetirementObligationsNoncurrent.description: Noncurrent portion of the carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsCurrent.label: Assets, Current
AssetsCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold, or consumed within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsFairValueDisclosure.label: Assets, Fair Value Disclosure
AssetsFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsHeldForSaleCurrent.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Current (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
AssetsHeldForSaleCurrent.description: Current assets (normally turning over within one year or one business cycle if longer) that are held for sale apart from normal operations and anticipated to be sold within one year.

AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Current
AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.description: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Current
AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityC.label: Business Acquisition, Cost of Acquired Entity, Cash Paid (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityC.description: Amount of cash paid to acquire the entity.

BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Deferred Taxes Asset (Liability), Net, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.description: Amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to noncurrent deferred tax assets net of valuation allowance and noncurrent deferred tax liabilities.

CapitalExpendituresIncurredButNotYetPaid.label: Capital Expenditures Incurred but Not yet Paid
CapitalExpendituresIncurredButNotYetPaid.description: Future cash outflow to pay for purchases of fixed assets that have occurred.

CapitalLeasedAssetsGross.label: Capital Leased Assets, Gross
CapitalLeasedAssetsGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of leased physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

CapitalLeaseObligationsCurrent.label: Capital Lease Obligations, Current
CapitalLeaseObligationsCurrent.description: Amount of capital lease obligation due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

CapitalLeaseObligationsIncurred.label: Lease Obligation Incurred
CapitalLeaseObligationsIncurred.description: Amount of increase in lease obligation from new lease.

CapitalLeaseObligationsNoncurrent.label: Capital Lease Obligations, Noncurrent
CapitalLeaseObligationsNoncurrent.description: Amount equal to the present value (the principal) at the beginning of the lease term of minimum lease payments during the lease term (excluding that portion of the payments representing executory costs such as insurance, maintenance, and taxes to be paid by the lessor, together with any profit thereon) net of payments or other amounts applied to the principal, through the balance sheet date and due to be paid more than one year (or one operating cycle, if longer) after the balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCur.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCur.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Five Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Four Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Three Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Two Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueThe.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due Thereafter
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueThe.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsIntere.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Interest Included in Payments
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsIntere.description: Amount necessary to reduce net minimum lease payments to present value for capital leases.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsNetMin.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Net Minimum Payments
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsNetMin.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases net of executory costs, which include amounts paid by the lessee to the lessor for insurance, maintenance and taxes.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsPresen.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Present Value of Net Minimum Payments
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsPresen.description: Present value of minimum lease payments for capital leases net of executory costs, including amounts paid by the lessee to the lessor for insurance, maintenance and taxes.

CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementAmortization.label: Capital Leases, Income Statement, Amortization Expense
CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementAmortization.description: The charge for the use of long-lived depreciable capital leased assets for the period.

CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementInterestExpe.label: Capital Leases, Income Statement, Interest Expense
CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementInterestExpe.description: The financing charge for leasing arrangements meeting the criteria for capitalization.

CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByM.label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Accumulated Depreciation
CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByM.description: The total charge for the use of long-lived depreciable assets subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

Cash.label: Cash
Cash.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivitiesD.label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Discontinued Operations
CashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActivitiesD.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities of discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesD.label: Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Discontinued Operations
CashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivitiesD.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of operating activities of discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold.label: Cost of Goods and Services Sold
CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold.description: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

CostOfGoodsSold.label: Cost of Goods Sold (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
CostOfGoodsSold.description: Total costs related to goods produced and sold during the reporting period.

CostsAndExpenses.label: Costs and Expenses
CostsAndExpenses.description: Total costs of sales and operating expenses for the period.

CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Federal Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to taxable income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.label: Debt and Lease Obligation
DebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.description: Amount of short-term and long-term debt and lease obligation.

DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.label: Debt Instrument, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.description: Percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the debt instrument.

DebtIssuanceCosts.label: Debt Issuance Cost (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
DebtIssuanceCosts.description: Amount of debt issuance costs (for example, but not limited to, legal, accounting, broker, and regulatory fees).

DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Federal Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred federal income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredFinanceCostsGross.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Gross
DeferredFinanceCostsGross.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Noncurrent, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.

DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.label: Deferred State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredStateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBen.description: Amount of deferred state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredTaxAssetInterestCarryforward.label: Deferred Tax Asset, Interest Carryforward
DeferredTaxAssetInterestCarryforward.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible interest carryforward.

DeferredTaxAssetsGoodwillAndIntangibleAs.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Goodwill and Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxAssetsGoodwillAndIntangibleAs.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from intangible assets including goodwill.

DeferredTaxAssetsGross.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Gross
DeferredTaxAssetsGross.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsOther.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsOther.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences, classified as other.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Employee Benefits
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from employee benefits, classified as other.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Allowance for Doubtful Accounts
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the allowance for doubtful accounts.

DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.description: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

DeferredTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredTaxLiabilities.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpense.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Deferred Expense
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpense.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from capitalized costs.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesLeasingArrangement.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Leasing Arrangements
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesLeasingArrangement.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from leasing arrangements.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net, Noncurrent
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting and classified as noncurrent.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Other
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as other.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Property, Plant and Equipment
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

Depreciation.label: Depreciation
Depreciation.description: The amount of expense recognized in the current period that reflects the allocation of the cost of tangible assets over the assets' useful lives. Includes production and non-production related depreciation.

DepreciationAmortizationAndAccretionNet.label: Depreciation, Amortization and Accretion, Net
DepreciationAmortizationAndAccretionNet.description: The aggregate net amount of depreciation, amortization, and accretion recognized during an accounting period. As a noncash item, the net amount is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

DerivativeAssetsCurrent.label: Derivative Asset, Current
DerivativeAssetsCurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent.label: Derivative Asset, Noncurrent
DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Derivative Liability, Current
DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Derivative Liability, Noncurrent
DerivativeLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalO.label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal of Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax
DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalO.description: Amount after tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

DiscontinuedOperationIntercompanyAmounts.label: Discontinued Operation, Intercompany Amounts with Discontinued Operation before Disposal Transaction, Costs (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
DiscontinuedOperationIntercompanyAmounts.description: For a disposal group that is a component of the entity (discontinued operation), in the period in which the operations are initially classified as discontinued, the amounts of intercompany costs that were previously eliminated in consolidation for periods before the disposal transaction (in situations where revenue and cost producing activities with the disposed component will continue after disposal).

DiscontinuedOperationIntercompanyAmounts.label: Discontinued Operation, Intercompany Amounts with Discontinued Operation before Disposal Transaction, Revenue (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
DiscontinuedOperationIntercompanyAmounts.description: For a disposal group that is a component of the entity (discontinued operation), in the period in which the operations are initially classified as discontinued, the amounts of intercompany revenue that were previously eliminated in consolidation for periods before the disposal transaction (in situations where revenue and cost producing activities with the disposed component will continue after disposal).

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Noncurrent
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DueFromAffiliateCurrent.label: Due from Affiliate, Current
DueFromAffiliateCurrent.description: Amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, due within 1 year (or 1 business cycle).

DueFromRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.label: Due from Related Parties, Noncurrent
DueFromRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.description: Aggregate amount of receivables to be collected from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth, at the financial statement date. which are usually due after one year (or one business cycle).

DueToAffiliateCurrent.label: Due to Affiliate, Current
DueToAffiliateCurrent.description: Amount of payable due to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

EmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Employee-related Liabilities, Current
EmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Total of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

EnergyRelatedInventoryChemicals.label: Energy Related Inventory, Chemicals
EnergyRelatedInventoryChemicals.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of solvents or substances produced by or used in a process to change the shape, form or composition of some related matter.

EnergyRelatedInventoryNaturalGasLiquids.label: Energy Related Inventory, Natural Gas Liquids
EnergyRelatedInventoryNaturalGasLiquids.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of liquid hydrocarbon components recovered from natural gas.

EnergyRelatedInventoryOtherFossilFuel.label: Energy Related Inventory, Other Fossil Fuel
EnergyRelatedInventoryOtherFossilFuel.description: Amount of fossil fuel included in inventory classified as other.

EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution
EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return on investment, classified as operating activities. Excludes distribution for return of investment, classified as investing activities.

EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.label: Equity Method Investment, Ownership Percentage
EquityMethodInvestmentOwnershipPercentag.description: The percentage of ownership of common stock or equity participation in the investee accounted for under the equity method of accounting.

EquityMethodInvestmentRealizedGainLossOn.label: Equity Method Investment, Realized Gain (Loss) on Disposal
EquityMethodInvestmentRealizedGainLossOn.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of an equity method investment.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Current Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of current assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestments.label: Equity Method Investments
EquityMethodInvestments.description: This item represents the carrying amount on the entity's balance sheet of its investment in common stock of an equity method investee. This is not an indicator of the fair value of the investment, rather it is the initial cost adjusted for the entity's share of earnings and losses of the investee, adjusted for any distributions (dividends) and other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses recognized.

ExtraordinaryItemGainOrLossNetOfTaxAttri.label: Extraordinary Item, Gain (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent (Deprecated 2019-01-31)
ExtraordinaryItemGainOrLossNetOfTaxAttri.description: Net of tax amount of gain (loss) classified as extraordinary item, attributable to the parent.

FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.label: Finance Lease, Interest Expense
FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability.label: Finance Lease, Interest Payment on Liability
FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability.description: Amount of interest paid on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseLiability.label: Finance Lease, Liability
FinanceLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Current
FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as current.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as noncurrent.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payment, Due
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueAfterYea.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueAfterYea.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInNextRo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Next Rolling Twelve Months
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInNextRo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due after fifth fiscal year following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollin.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling after Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollin.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due after fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollin.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollin.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due in fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollin.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollin.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due in fourth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollin.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollin.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due in third rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollin.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueInRollin.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease, due in second rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueNextTwel.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAccumulatedAm.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAccumulatedAm.description: Amount of accumulated amortization of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetBeforeAccumul.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, before Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetBeforeAccumul.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Accumulated Amortization
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAccumulatedAm.description: Accumulated amount of amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, after Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for asset, excluding financial asset and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year One
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Five
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Four
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Three
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Asset, Expected Amortization, Year Two
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsAmortizationE.description: Amount of amortization for assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with finite life expected to be recognized in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

GainLossOnCondemnation.label: Gain (Loss) on Condemnation
GainLossOnCondemnation.description: The gain (loss) is the pre-tax difference between the net condemnation award and the entity's adjusted basis of the condemned property.

GainLossOnInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
GainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
GainLossOnSaleOfPropertyPlantEquipment.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

GainLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiaryOrEquit.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Stock in Subsidiary or Equity Method Investee
GainLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiaryOrEquit.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

GainsLossesOnRestructuringOfDebt.label: Gains (Losses) on Restructuring of Debt
GainsLossesOnRestructuringOfDebt.description: For a debtor, the aggregate gain (loss) recognized on the restructuring of payables arises from the difference between the book value of the debt before the restructuring and the fair value of the payments on the debt after restructuring is complete.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.label: General Partners' Capital Account
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountDistributio.label: General Partners' Capital Account, Period Distribution Amount
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountDistributio.description: The total amount of distributions to the general partner during the period.

GeneralPartnersContributedCapital.label: General Partners' Contributed Capital
GeneralPartnersContributedCapital.description: The amount of capital contributed by the general partner.

Goodwill.label: Goodwill
Goodwill.description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.label: Goodwill, Acquired During Period
GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.description: Amount of increase in asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from a business combination.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillWrittenOffRelatedToSaleOfBusines.label: Goodwill, Written off Related to Sale of Business Unit
GoodwillWrittenOffRelatedToSaleOfBusines.description: Amount of divestiture of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets Held-for-use
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

IncentiveDistributionDistributionPerYear.label: Incentive Distribution, Distribution
IncentiveDistributionDistributionPerYear.description: Amount of incentive obligation paid in cash or stock during the period to a limited liability corporation managing member or limited partnership general partner.

IncomeLossAttributableToParent.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToParent.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of income (loss) from equity method investments.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsNetOfT.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Diluted
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsNetOfT.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder and units that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for dilutive potential units outstanding.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.description: The amount of Income or Loss from continuing operations available to each limited partnership unit in a publicly trade limited partnership or master limited partnership (MLP) during the reporting period. Limited partners have limited liability and do not manage the partnership.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder in a publicly trade limited partnership (LP) or master limited partnership (MLP).

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Diluted (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerOut.description: The amount of Income or Loss from continuing operations available to each limited partner unit outstanding during the reporting period and each unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for all dilutive potential units outstanding during the reporting period. Limited partners have limited liability and do not manage the partnership.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation attributable to the parent. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: The amount of income (loss) from disposition of discontinued operations available to each limited partnership unit during the reporting period, net of tax.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of gain (loss) on disposal of discontinued operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Diluted (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: The amount of Income or Loss from disposition of discontinued operations available to each limited partner unit outstanding during the reporting period and each unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for all dilutive potential units outstanding during the reporting period. Limited partners have limited liability and do not manage the partnership.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Diluted
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of gain (loss) on disposal of discontinued operations available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder and units that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for all dilutive potential units outstanding.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxesPaid.label: Income Taxes Paid
IncomeTaxesPaid.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndOtherReceiv.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts and Other Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndOtherReceiv.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from customers for the credit sale of goods and services; includes accounts receivable and other types of receivables.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableTrade.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable, Trade
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableTrade.description: Change in recurring obligations of a business that arise from the acquisition of merchandise, materials, supplies and services used in the production and sale of goods and services.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedIncomeTaxesPaya.label: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedIncomeTaxesPaya.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the amount due for taxes based on the reporting entity's earnings or attributable to the entity's income earning process (business presence) within a given jurisdiction.

IncreaseDecreaseInAssetsHeldForSale.label: Increase (Decrease) in Assets Held-for-sale
IncreaseDecreaseInAssetsHeldForSale.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in book value of long-lived assets that the reporting entity plans to sell within one year (or one business cycle).

IncreaseDecreaseInDerivativeAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Derivative Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInDerivativeAssets.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying value of derivative instruments reported as assets that are due to be disposed of within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromAffiliatesCurre.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due from Affiliates, Current
IncreaseDecreaseInDueFromAffiliatesCurre.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in current receivables (due within one year or one operating cycle) to be collected from an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliatesCurrent.label: Increase (Decrease) in Due to Affiliates, Current
IncreaseDecreaseInDueToAffiliatesCurrent.description: The increase (decrease) in current obligations (due within one year or one operating cycle) owed to an entity that is controlling, under the control of, or within the same control group as the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

IncreaseDecreaseInInterestPayableNet.label: Increase (Decrease) in Interest Payable, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInInterestPayableNet.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in interest payable, which represents the amount owed to note holders, bond holders, and other parties for interest earned on loans or credit extended to the reporting entity.

IncreaseDecreaseInInventories.label: Increase (Decrease) in Inventories
IncreaseDecreaseInInventories.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of all inventory held by the reporting entity, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccruedLiabilitie.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAccruedLiabilitie.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in other expenses incurred but not yet paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Current Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in current assets classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentAssetsA.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Noncurrent Assets and Liabilities, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherNoncurrentAssetsA.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent operating assets after deduction of noncurrent operating liabilities classified as other.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

InterestPaid.label: Interest Paid, Including Capitalized Interest, Operating and Investing Activities
InterestPaid.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, including, but not limited to, capitalized interest and payment to settle zero-coupon bond attributable to accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount; classified as operating and investing activities.

InterestPaidCapitalized.label: Interest Paid, Capitalized, Investing Activities
InterestPaidCapitalized.description: Amount of cash paid for interest capitalized, classified as investing activity.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InterestPayableCurrent.label: Interest Payable, Current
InterestPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of [accrued] interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred and is unpaid. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

InterestRateCashFlowHedgeGainLossReclass.label: Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Earnings, Net
InterestRateCashFlowHedgeGainLossReclass.description: The amount of net gains or losses on interest rate cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income upon the hedged transaction affecting earnings.

InventoryNet.label: Inventory, Net
InventoryNet.description: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

InvestmentIncomeAmortizationOfPremium.label: Investment Income, Amortization of Premium
InvestmentIncomeAmortizationOfPremium.description: Amount of amortization of purchase premium on nonoperating securities.

InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.label: Investments in and Advance to Affiliates, Subsidiaries, Associates, and Joint Ventures
InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.description: Amount of investment in equity method investee and investment in and advance to affiliate.

LeaseAndRentalExpense.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense
LeaseAndRentalExpense.description: Amount of rent expense incurred for leased assets, including but not limited to, furniture and equipment, that is not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

LeaseCost.label: Lease, Cost
LeaseCost.description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Payments, Due after Rolling Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease, due after fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease, due in fifth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease, due in fourth rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease, due in third rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Payments, Due in Rolling Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease, due in second rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Payments, Due Next Rolling Twelve Months
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease, due in next rolling twelve months following latest statement of financial position date. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest statement of financial position date.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease having initial or remaining lease term in excess of one year to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Five
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Four
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year One
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, after Year Five
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Three
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.label: Lessor, Operating Lease, Payment to be Received, Year Two
LessorOperatingLeasePaymentsToBeReceived.description: Amount of lease payment to be received by lessor for operating lease in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LiabilitiesCurrent.label: Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesCurrent.description: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Financial and Nonfinancial Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.

LiabilitiesOfAssetsHeldForSale.label: Liabilities of Assets Held-for-sale (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
LiabilitiesOfAssetsHeldForSale.description: Liability (such as a mortgage) related to a disposal group that is held for sale and anticipated to be sold in less than one year. The liability is expected to be discharged as part of the plan of sale for the asset.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.
