LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Noncurrent
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCOrLimitedPartn.label: Limited Liability Company (LLC) or Limited Partnership (LP), Managing Member or General Partner, Ownership Interest
LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCOrLimitedPartn.description: Percentage investment held by the managing member or general partner of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCOrLimitedPartn.label: Limited Liability Company or Limited Partnership, Members or Limited Partners, Ownership Interest
LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCOrLimitedPartn.description: Percentage investment held by members or limited partners of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountDistributio.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Distribution Amount
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountDistributio.description: The total amount of distributions to limited partners.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Outstanding
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.description: The number of limited partner units outstanding.

LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapa.label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Borrowing Capacity
LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumBorrowingCapa.description: Maximum borrowing capacity under the credit facility without consideration of any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed or the amounts currently outstanding under the facility.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation
LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as noncurrent.

LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsCu.label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation, Current
LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsCu.description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as current.

LongTermDebtCurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Current Maturities
LongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt, classified as current. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtNoncurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
LongTermDebtNoncurrent.description: Amount after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs of long-term debt classified as noncurrent and excluding amounts to be repaid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LossContingencyDamagesAwardedValue.label: Loss Contingency, Damages Awarded, Value
LossContingencyDamagesAwardedValue.description: Amount of damages awarded to the plaintiff in the legal matter.

NaturalGasProductionRevenue.label: Natural Gas Production Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
NaturalGasProductionRevenue.description: Revenue from natural gas production during the reporting period. Natural gas consists largely of the hydrocarbon methane, and is found in underground formations either by itself or with crude oil.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of investing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to General Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToGeneralPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to general partners.

NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.label: Net Income (Loss) Allocated to Limited Partners
NetIncomeLossAllocatedToLimitedPartners.description: Aggregate amount of net income allocated to limited partners.

NetIncomeLossNetOfTaxPerOutstandingLimit.label: Net Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Diluted
NetIncomeLossNetOfTaxPerOutstandingLimit.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to limited partnership (LP) unit-holder and units that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for dilutive potential units outstanding.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic and Diluted, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: The amount of net income or loss for the period per each limited partnership and general partnership unit in instances when basic and diluted earnings per unit are the same amount and aggregated on the face of the financial statements. Basic earnings per unit is the amount of net income or loss for the period per unit outstanding during the reporting period. Diluted earnings per unit includes the amount of net income or loss for the period available to each limited and general partnership unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of units for all dilutive potential units outstanding during the reporting period.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Net income (loss) allocated to each outstanding limited partnership unit.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Basic, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Per unit of ownership amount after tax of income (loss) available to outstanding limited partnership (LP) unit-holder.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership Unit, Diluted (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: Net Income or Loss allocated to each limited partner unit outstanding during the reporting period and each unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of limited partner units for all dilutive potential units outstanding during the reporting period. Limited partners have limited liability and do not manage the partnership.

NonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
NonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

NotesPayableFairValueDisclosure.label: Notes Payable, Fair Value Disclosure
NotesPayableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of notes payable.

NotesReceivableFairValueDisclosure.label: Notes Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
NotesReceivableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of an agreement for an unconditional promise by the maker to pay the holder a definite sum of money at a future date.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

OperatingCostsAndExpenses.label: Operating Costs and Expenses
OperatingCostsAndExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Excludes Selling, General and Administrative Expense.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OperatingLeaseCost.label: Operating Lease, Cost
OperatingLeaseCost.description: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Net
OperatingLeasesRentExpenseNet.description: Rental expense for the reporting period incurred under operating leases, including minimum and any contingent rent expense, net of related sublease income.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
OtherAccruedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount of expenses incurred but not yet paid classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAssetsCurrent.label: Other Assets, Current
OtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of current assets classified as other.

OtherAssetsNoncurrent.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
OtherAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.description: This element represents Other Comprehensive Income or Loss, Net of Tax, for the period. Includes deferred gains or losses on qualifying hedges, unrealized holding gains or losses on available-for-sale securities, minimum pension liability, and cumulative translation adjustment. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Other Intangible Assets, Net
OtherIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after accumulated amortization of finite-lived and indefinite-lived intangible assets classified as other.

OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
OtherLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.label: Other Noncash Income (Expense)
OtherNoncashIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) included in net income that results in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherOperatingIncome.label: Other Operating Income
OtherOperatingIncome.description: The total amount of other operating income, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net
OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountAcquisitions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Acquisitions
PartnersCapitalAccountAcquisitions.description: Change in the different classes of partners' capital accounts during the year due to acquisitions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Contributions
PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.description: Total contributions made by each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributionPerUni.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distribution Per Unit of Limited Partner Interest
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributionPerUni.description: The amount of the distribution per unit of limited partner interest.

PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Distributions
PartnersCapitalAccountDistributions.description: Total distributions to each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountExchangesAndConver.label: Partners' Capital Account, Exchanges and Conversions
PartnersCapitalAccountExchangesAndConver.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to exchanges and conversions. Partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountPrivatePlacementOf.label: Partners' Capital Account, Private Placement of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountPrivatePlacementOf.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a private placement.

PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Public Sale of Units
PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnits.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a public offering.

PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnitsN.label: Partners' Capital Account, Public Sale of Units Net of Offering Costs
PartnersCapitalAccountPublicSaleOfUnitsN.description: Monetary value of the issuance of new units of limited partnership interest in a public offering, net of offering costs. This is a parenthetical disclosure.

PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Redemptions
PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountReturnOfCapital.label: Partners' Capital Account, Return of Capital
PartnersCapitalAccountReturnOfCapital.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to the return of partner's capital. That is, excess distributions over earnings to partners. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountTreasuryUnitsPurch.label: Partners' Capital Account, Treasury Units, Purchased
PartnersCapitalAccountTreasuryUnitsPurch.description: Value of units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitBasedCompensat.label: Partners' Capital Account, Unit-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitBasedCompensat.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital account for unit-based payment arrangement issued by partnership. Partner includes, but is not limited to, general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPrivate.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Sold in Private Placement
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPrivate.description: The number of units sold in a private placement of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPublicO.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Sold in Public Offering
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsSoldInPublicO.description: The number of units sold in a public offering of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasury.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Treasury Units Purchased
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsTreasury.description: Units that were previously issued and have been repurchased during the year.

PartnersCapitalOther.label: Partners' Capital, Other
PartnersCapitalOther.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in partners' capital classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfOtherEquity.label: Payments for Repurchase of Other Equity
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfOtherEquity.description: Amount of cash outflow to reacquire equity classified as other.

PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.label: Payment for Debt Extinguishment or Debt Prepayment Cost
PaymentsOfDebtExtinguishmentCosts.description: Amount of cash outflow for cost from early extinguishment and prepayment of debt. Includes, but is not limited to, third-party cost, premium paid, and other fee paid to lender directly for debt extinguishment or debt prepayment. Excludes accrued interest.

PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Debt Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt.

PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.label: Payments of Distributions to Affiliates
PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.description: The distributions of earnings to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

PaymentsOfMergerRelatedCostsFinancingAct.label: Payments of Merger Related Costs, Financing Activities
PaymentsOfMergerRelatedCostsFinancingAct.description: The cash outflow for financing costs associated with business combinations.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Gross
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of business during the period. The cash portion only of the acquisition price.

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Equity Method Investments
PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of or advances to an equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Intangible Assets
PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.description: The cash outflow to acquire asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.description: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PriceRiskCashFlowHedgeGainOrLossReclassi.label: Price Risk Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Earnings, Net
PriceRiskCashFlowHedgeGainOrLossReclassi.description: The amount of net gains or losses on price risk cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income.

PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.label: Prior Period Reclassification Adjustment
PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.description: The amount of a reclassification adjustment made to prior period financial statement amounts.

ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.label: Proceeds from Contributions from Affiliates
ProceedsFromContributionsFromAffiliates.description: The cash inflow from an entity that is affiliated with the entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.

ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution, Return of Capital
ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return of investment, classified as investing activities. Excludes distribution for return on investment, classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvesting.label: Proceeds from Insurance Settlement, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvesting.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of insurance claim, classified as investing activities. Excludes insurance settlement classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromIssuanceInitialPublicOfferin.label: Proceeds from Issuance Initial Public Offering
ProceedsFromIssuanceInitialPublicOfferin.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from entity's first offering of stock to the public.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Limited Partners Units
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common limited partners units during the period.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromLimitedPartnershipInvestment.label: Proceeds from Limited Partnership Investments
ProceedsFromLimitedPartnershipInvestment.description: Cash inflow received as distributions, returns of capital, or sale proceeds from partnership interests held for investment purposes.

ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.label: Proceeds from Partnership Contribution
ProceedsFromPartnershipContribution.description: The cash inflow from the capital received in cash from a partner in a partnership during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Method Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherProductiveAssets.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of tangible or intangible assets used to produce goods or deliver services, classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property, Plant, and Equipment
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyPlantAndEquipm.description: The cash inflow from the sale of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation and amortization from plant, property, and equipment and right-of-use asset from finance lease.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, after Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount, after accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment and Finance Lease Right-of-Use Asset, before Accumulated Depreciation and Amortization
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAndFinanceLease.description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.label: Related Party Transaction, Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RelatedPartyTransactionSellingGeneralAnd.label: Related Party Transaction, Selling, General and Administrative Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionSellingGeneralAnd.description: Amount of selling, general and administrative expenses resulting from transactions, excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements, with related party.

RepaymentOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedPar.label: Repayment of Notes Receivable from Related Parties
RepaymentOfNotesReceivableFromRelatedPar.description: The cash inflow from a loan, supported by a promissory note, granted to related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebtAndCapitalSecuri.label: Repayment of Long-term Debt, Long-term Lease Obligation, and Capital Security
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebtAndCapitalSecuri.description: Amount of cash outflow for debt, mandatory redeemable security, and principal payment for finance lease obligation.

RetainedEarningsUndistributedEarningsFro.label: Retained Earnings, Undistributed Earnings from Equity Method Investees
RetainedEarningsUndistributedEarningsFro.description: Amount of consolidated retained earnings that represent undistributed (not yet received) earnings from 50% or less owned persons accounted for by the equity method (equity method investees).

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerExcluding.description: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Including Assessed Tax
RevenueFromContractWithCustomerIncluding.description: Amount, including tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value-added and excise.

RevenueFromRelatedParties.label: Revenue from Related Parties
RevenueFromRelatedParties.description: Amount of revenue, fees and commissions earned from transactions between (a) a parent company and its subsidiaries; (b) subsidiaries of a common parent; (c) an entity and trusts for the benefit of employees, for example, but not limited to, pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; (d) an entity and its principal, owners, management, or members of their immediate families; and (e) affiliates.

RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligation.label: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Amount
RevenueRemainingPerformanceObligation.description: Amount of transaction price allocated to performance obligation that has not been recognized as revenue.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

RevenuesFromTransactionsWithOtherOperati.label: Segment Reporting Information, Intersegment Revenue (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
RevenuesFromTransactionsWithOtherOperati.description: Amount of revenue from transactions with other operating segments of the same entity.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Finance Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForFina.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for finance lease liability.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SaleOfStockPricePerShare.label: Sale of Stock, Price Per Share
SaleOfStockPricePerShare.description: Per share amount received by subsidiary or equity investee for each share of common stock issued or sold in the stock transaction.

SalesRevenueGoodsNet.label: Sales Revenue, Goods, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueGoodsNet.description: Aggregate revenue during the period from the sale of goods in the normal course of business, after deducting returns, allowances and discounts.

SalesRevenueNet.label: Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueNet.description: Total revenue from sale of goods and services rendered during the reporting period, in the normal course of business, reduced by sales returns and allowances, and sales discounts.

SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
SellingGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Number of Shares Authorized
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of shares authorized for issuance under share-based payment arrangement.

SharePrice.label: Share Price
SharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks of a company.

ShortTermLeaseCost.label: Short-term Lease, Cost
ShortTermLeaseCost.description: Amount of short-term lease cost, excluding expense for lease with term of one month or less.

StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.label: State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations
StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.description: Amount of state and local current and deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.

StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.label: Shares Granted, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Forfeited
StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.description: Value of forfeited shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssued1.label: Stock Issued
StockIssued1.description: The fair value of stock issued in noncash financing activities.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards forfeited during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Net of Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards issued during the period, net of the stock value of such awards forfeited.

TaxesPayableCurrent.label: Taxes Payable, Current
TaxesPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.label: Weighted Average Limited Partnership Units Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageLimitedPartnershipUnitsOu.description: Weighted average number of limited partnership units outstanding determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that limited partnership units have been outstanding to the total time in that period. Used in the calculation of diluted net income or loss per limited partnership unit.

WeightedAverageNumerDilutedLimitedPartne.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Limited Partnership Units Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumerDilutedLimitedPartne.description: The sum of dilutive potential limited partnership units used in the calculation of the diluted per-unit computation.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.

AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroup.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group
AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroup.description: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax and before reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.description: Amount of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount capitalized.
